data.name: Project Genesis - Platinum Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
In the 21st century, PLATINUM is one of the most valuable metals on Earth and you’ll be recognized as one of the most valuable Founders with your purchase of the PLATINUM PACK. You demand the best, nothing less. Look the best and be the best with the Platinum Founders Pack. With this Pack you’ll acquire the Platinum animated Emblem, Titanium animated Kill Card Banner, eight Titanium battle craft skins, the Project Genesis Remastered Original Soundtrack in the FUTURE, the unique Roger's Roughnecks in the future, and a FUTURE allocation 1999 in-game Credits!

Items in the Platinum Founders Pack include:

  • Platinum Animated Emblem
  • Platinum Animated Banner
  • Platinum Themed Skin Covering 8 Ships
  • Founders Pack Color Palette
  • Remastered OST (future release)
  • Founders battle craft Skin (Roger’s Roughnecks - future release)
  • Bonus Credits (future release)

*If you're already an owner of this pack and don't see your items in-game, please re-link Steam to your account profile on projectgenesis.com and login again into the game to receive your items. Contact us with any further issues.

data.short_description: You demand the best, nothing less. Look the best - be the best with the Platinum Founder’s Pack and show your support for Project Genesis as a Founder!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

package_groups.title: Buy Project Genesis - Platinum Founders Pack
